text: (Allāh) kūṟuvāṉ; "jiṉkaḷ, maṉitarkaḷ kūṭṭattārkaḷiliruntu uṅkaḷukku muṉ ceṉṟavarkaḷuṭaṉ nīṅkaḷum (naraka) neruppil nuḻaiyuṅkaḷ." Ovvoru kūṭṭattārum, narakattil nuḻaiyumpōtellām, (taṅkaḷukku muṉ, aṅku vantuḷḷa) tam iṉattāraic capippārkaḷ; avarkaḷ yāvarum narakattaiyaṭaintu viṭṭa piṉṉar, piṉ vantavarkaḷ muṉ vantavarkaḷaippaṟṟi, "eṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉē! Ivarkaḷ tāṉ eṅkaḷai vaḻi keṭuttārkaḷ; ātalāl ivarkaḷukku narakattil iru maṭaṅku vētaṉaiyaik koṭu" eṉṟu colvārkaḷ. Avaṉ kūṟuvāṉ; "uṅkaḷil ovvoruvarukkum iraṭṭippu (vētaṉai) uṇṭu - āṉāl nīṅkaḷ atai aṟiyamāṭṭīrkaḷ
